name: Idle Champions: Painted Tortle Gromma Theme Pack
summary: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Gromma (if you don't already have them) Painted Tortle Gromma Skin An Exclusive Familiar An Epic Feat for Gromma 1 Epic Potion of the Gem Hunter 16 Gold Gromma Chests with 2 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Cards
